Class.name: TK.Zen.TemplatePage
Class.Description: Created using the page template: Default

Parameter.name: APPLICATION
Parameter.Description: Class name of application this page belongs to.

Parameter.name: CURRENTMENUITEM
Parameter.Description: Id of the menu item that should be current when displaying this page

Parameter.name: TABLEPANES
Parameter.Description: List of table pane ids to apply preferences to

Property.name: viewIDs
Property.Description: Preference: view column for object ids in table panes

XData.name: Style
XData.Description: This Style block contains page-specific CSS style definitions.

XData.name: Contents
XData.Description: This XML block defines the contents of this page.
XData.Data: <page xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/zen" xmlns:custom="http://www.intersystems.com/zen/custom" title="Service Catalog" dragAndDrop="true"> <hgroup id="topForBanner"> <hgroup id="banner"> <pane paneName="bannerPane"/> </hgroup> </hgroup> <vgroup id="bottomForContent"> <vgroup id="contentGroup"> <label id="contentLabel" value="#(%page.%GetPageName())#" /> <pane paneName="ContentPane"/> </vgroup> </vgroup> </page>

XData.name: bannerPane
XData.Data: <pane> <hgroup> <label id="titleLabel" value="TjÃ¤nstekatalog" /> <link id="titleUserName" caption="#(%page.userName)#" title="Logout" href="TK.Zen.Logout.cls"/> </hgroup> <hmenu id="menu"> <menuItem id="menuItemRIVTA" caption="RIV-TA profile" link="TK.Zen.RIVTA.cls" title="Manage RIV-TA profiles" /> <menuItem id="menuItemServiceContracts" caption="Contract" link="TK.Zen.Tjanstekontrakt.cls" title="Manage Service Contracts" /> <menuItem id="menuItemServiceComponents" caption="Service components" link="TK.Zen.ServiceComponents.cls" title="Manage service components" /> <menuItem id="menuItemLogicalAddressees" caption="Logical addressees" link="TK.Zen.LogicalAddressees.cls" title="Manage logical addressees" /> <menuItem id="menuItemLogicalAddresses" caption="Logical addresses" link="TK.Zen.LogicalAddresses.cls" title="Manage logical addresses" /> <menuItem id="menuItemAccessRights" caption="Access rights" link="TK.Zen.AccessRights.cls" title="Manage access rights" /> <menuItem id="menuItemPublish" caption="Publish Service" link="TK.Zen.PublishService.cls" title="Publish services" /> <menuItem id="menuItemAbout" caption="About" link="TK.Zen.About.cls" title="About Service catalog" /> </hmenu> </pane>

Method.name: %OnAfterCreatePage
onloadHandler
updateMenu
refreshContextLabel
setPropertySet
Method.Implementation: Set tSep = $Extract(pList,1) For i=2:1:$Length(pList, tSep) Set tProp = $Piece(pList, tSep, i),tName=$Piece(tProp,"=",1),tVal=$Piece(tProp,"=",2),$Property(pObj,tName)=tVal

Method.name: SetContext
Method.Implementation: #Dim tOk As %Boolean = 1 Do %application.SetContext(pName, pId) Quit tOk

Method.name: MakeUserMessage
Method.Implementation: #Dim tText As %String = pException.DisplayString() Set tText = $Replace(tText, "ERROR #5001: ", "") Quit pTextBefore _ tText _ pTextAfter

Method.name: onresizeHandler
Method.Description: This client event, if present, is fired when the page is resized.

Parameter.name: HTMLDTD
Parameter.Description: If true, draw an HTML Document Type Declaration at the start of this page.

Method.name: %OnDetermineCSSLevel
Method.Description: This callback method determines lets a page specify level of CSS support is used by this page. The default is to return "", which indicates that the built-in ZEN CSS level detection is used. A page can override this and return 2 or 3.
